short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension meant to alert you if you are a winner of the hourly prize on the swagbucks blog.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension meant to alert you if you are a winner of the hourly prize on the Swagbucks blog. You can enter your username and that addon will send a (controllable) notification if you win. In addition the icon will show an exclamation if you have won.
